job_details.Vacaturetitel: Artificial Intelligence Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a full-stack AI wizard ready to redefine the frontier of K-12 learning? Join the education revolution at 2 Hour Learning!

   At 2 Hour Learning, we're not just talking about transforming education - we're proving it with hard data. Our learning ecosystem harnesses cutting-edge AI, learning science, and psychometrics to create a digital learning environment that's twice as effective as traditional schooling. High schoolers ace AP exams, middle schoolers advance 2 grade levels per year, and even kindergarteners shatter learning goals.

   You'll play a pivotal role in architecting this AI-powered learning revolution. You'll wield autonomy and creative freedom to envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools that engage students and drive learning efficiency to unprecedented heights.

   This isn't a role for AI dabblers or back-end-only coders. We seek bold AI architects who can seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences. You'll own and optimize the entire product lifecycle, partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs., * Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences
     * Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
     * Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation
     * Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Coding narrow AI features in isolation of overarching product goals and learner needs
     * Implementing AI in a superficial, "buzzwordy" way that doesn't drive material learning gains
     * Toiling away at small-scale internal demos; your applications will drive learning impact for thousands
     * Waiting for others to define product requirements or conduct user research; you'll lead the charge
     * Wasting hours on manual QA; you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency, Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_details.full_text:
Artificial Intelligence Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you a full-stack AI wizard ready to redefine the frontier of K-12 learning? Join the education revolution at 2 Hour Learning!

   At 2 Hour Learning, we're not just talking about transforming education - we're proving it with hard data. Our learning ecosystem harnesses cutting-edge AI, learning science, and psychometrics to create a digital learning environment that's twice as effective as traditional schooling. High schoolers ace AP exams, middle schoolers advance 2 grade levels per year, and even kindergarteners shatter learning goals.

   You'll play a pivotal role in architecting this AI-powered learning revolution. You'll wield autonomy and creative freedom to envision, code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools that engage students and drive learning efficiency to unprecedented heights.

   This isn't a role for AI dabblers or back-end-only coders. We seek bold AI architects who can seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences. You'll own and optimize the entire product lifecycle, partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs., * Continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences
     * Owning end-to-end product lifecycle, from gathering requirements to development, launch and iterative enhancement
     * Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation
     * Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Coding narrow AI features in isolation of overarching product goals and learner needs
     * Implementing AI in a superficial, "buzzwordy" way that doesn't drive material learning gains
     * Toiling away at small-scale internal demos; your applications will drive learning impact for thousands
     * Waiting for others to define product requirements or conduct user research; you'll lead the charge
     * Wasting hours on manual QA; you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency, Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and deployment of applications built on generative AI, including 'architecting this AI-powered learning revolution', 'seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences', and 'continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech'. The core responsibilities align with building user-facing software systems and leveraging LLMs, which are hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer profile. While there's mention of 'full-stack AI wizard' and 'full-stack applications', the focus is on integrating AI capabilities into these applications rather than traditional full-stack development in isolation.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences' directly points to the development and adaptation of generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: continually experimenting with and integrating the latest generative AI tech to pioneer novel educational experiences

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'architecting this AI-powered learning revolution', 'code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools', and 'seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences', indicating the development of software systems that incorporate AI.
The phrase 'code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools' clearly describes the development and deployment of software applications.
job_tasks.phrase: code, and ship sophisticated full-stack applications and interactive AI tools

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences' highlights the integration of AI into various layers of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly weave AI magic across front-end interfaces, back-end algorithms, and end-to-end product experiences

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'own and optimize the entire product lifecycle' implies managing the development and maintenance of a product, which is a core software development responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: own and optimize the entire product lifecycle

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs' indicates an understanding of business context and translating user needs into technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: partnering closely with stakeholders to ensure we're nailing learner needs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness' points to using AI for operational tasks like testing and debugging, which falls under MLOps principles.
job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging AI-driven automation across testing, debugging and beyond to maximize development velocity and robustness

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency' describes the core task of building and deploying AI-powered software.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation' shows an understanding of business goals and user needs to drive development.
job_tasks.phrase: Partnering with stakeholders to align development with learner needs and garner insights to fuel cycles of innovation

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'you'll leverage AI-powered testing to maximize efficiency' indicates the use of AI for automating testing processes, which is part of MLOps.
